plot: Obsessed Oliver Crangle wants to expose vice in the world, investigating people that he sees as evil, and then attempting to ruin their lives. His plan is to punish them all by an unspecified means at 4:00 this afternoon.

Oliver Crangle seems to like making other people miserable. He phones a young man's employer to say that the man is a communist. He phone a school board to tell them a teacher is acting inappropriately with his students. He has a long list of people that he wants to tell on. He even arranges a meeting with an FBI agent and tells him that at 4 p.m. all of the nasty people in the world will undergo a transformation. The agent suggests he seek psychiatric treatment but it turns out he's right.—garykmcd
